form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Alexander introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works

form.official-title: To amend the Endangered Species Act of 1973 to protect and conserve species and the lawful possession of certain ivory in the United States, and for other purposes.

section.text:
This Act may be cited as the
Lawful Ivory Protection Act of 2014
.

section.header: Amendment to Endangered Species Act of 1973

paragraph.text: by inserting (1) after the subsection heading; and
by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Except as provided in this paragraph, regulations promulgated under paragraph (1), including policies, orders, or practices pursuant to such regulations, may not—

clause.text: prohibit or restrict the importation of such ivory that was lawfully importable into the United States on February 24, 2014; or
prohibit or restrict the possession of such ivory that was lawfully possessable in the United States on February 24, 2014.

subparagraph.text: Subparagraph (A) does not apply to regulations, including policies, orders, or practices pursuant to such regulations, that were in effect on February 24, 2014.

Regulations promulgated under paragraph (1), including policies, orders, or practices pursuant to such regulations, that became effective during the period beginning on February 25, 2014, and ending on the date of enactment of this paragraph, shall be revised, as necessary, to comply with the requirements specified in subparagraph (A) for regulations promulgated after such date of enactment.
